Edith Carlmar was born on November 15, 1911, and died on May 17, 2003, making her 91 years old at the time of her death. Since Edith Carlmar is older than Michael Curtiz, the film "Aldri Annet Enn Bråk" has the older director. 

Answer: Aldri Annet Enn Bråk.
